Major_Arcs.title: Introduction and Initial Mystery
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the Human Meteor and sets up the initial mystery involving the playboys, G-Men, and Duke's suspicion.

sub_scenes.title: Cover and Taxi Ride Setup
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene includes the cover introduction of The Human Meteor and the initial taxi ride where Duke picks up the playboys, setting the stage for the unfolding events.

sub_scenes.title: Chase and Human Meteor's Emergence
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers the G-Men's chase and Duke's transformation into the Human Meteor to confront them.

sub_scenes.title: Human Meteor vs. G-Men and Aftermath
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Human Meteor's confrontation with the G-Men, the police reaction, and the injured G-Man's suspicions, setting up the yacht plot.

sub_scenes.title: Stowaway Plan and Yacht Infiltration
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Toby and Duke's plan to stowaway on the yacht Marlin and Toby's successful infiltration, leading to his discovery.

Major_Arcs.title: Yacht Investigation and Underwater Conflict
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details Toby's investigation on the yacht, his discovery of the submarine plot, and the ensuing underwater confrontation involving Namor.

sub_scenes.title: Toby as Cabin Boy and Chart Discovery
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Toby disguised as Pete, his initial observations on the yacht, and his discovery of the marked depth chart.

narrative_arcs.title: Discovery of the Marked Depth Chart
Reporting to the Captain and Recognition

sub_scenes.title: Namor's Underwater Intervention and Conflict
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on Namor's underwater investigation based on Toby's report, his discovery of the torpedo operation, and his confrontation with the divers.

narrative_arcs.title: Namor's Urgent Dive and Submarine Discovery
Underwater Torpedo Operation and Namor's Realization
Targeting the Submarine with a Torpedo

sub_scenes.title: Ship Attack and Yacht Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene includes the ship crew's reaction to underwater events, Namor's attack on the ship, and his subsequent confrontation on the yacht.

narrative_arcs.title: Ship Crew Reacts to Peter's Fate and Geyser
Namor Reaches the Yacht and Confronts the Crew

sub_scenes.title: Resolution on Yacht and Return Home
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene concludes the yacht storyline with Namor finding the depth map, exposing Peter, and the subsequent escape and return home for Toby and Duke.

narrative_arcs.title: Searching for the Depth Map in Peter's Cabin
Presenting the Depth Map to the Captain

Major_Arcs.title: Liberty Lads vs. Nazi Spies
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts to the Liberty Lads storyline, focusing on their confrontation with Nazi spies and the subsequent neighborhood mystery and resolution.

sub_scenes.title: Liberty Lads Confrontation and Ambulance Mystery
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the Liberty Lads fighting Nazis and then transitions to a neighborhood scene with an ambulance arrival, sparking a new mystery.

sub_scenes.title: The Dropped Wallet and Bus Garage Investigation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers the boys' discovery of a dropped wallet, their attempt to return it, and their subsequent investigation at the bus company garage.

narrative_arcs.title: Boys Attempt to Return Dropped Wallet
Discovery of the Wallet and Bus Company Address
Marine Salute and Major Bronson's Identity
Explanation of Major Bronson's Civilian Clothes

sub_scenes.title: Bus Garage Confrontation and Rescue
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details the boys' arrival at the bus garage, their encounter with Mr. Horst, the escalating threat, and Major Bronson's intervention and eventual rescue by the military.

narrative_arcs.title: Returning the Wallet to the Bus Company
Mr. Horst's Abrupt Arrival and Confrontation
Close-up of Mr. Horst's Menacing Face
Major's Injury and Urgent Medical Aid

Major_Arcs.title: South American Adventure and Rosita's Kidnapping
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts to a South American setting, introducing a new adventure involving 'The Champ' and Henry, and the mystery surrounding Rosita's kidnapping.

sub_scenes.title: Desert Flashback and South American Setting
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene begins with a flashback to a desert fight involving 'The Champ' and Henry, then transitions to establishing their presence in a South American town.

narrative_arcs.title: Establishment of a South American Town Setting

sub_scenes.title: Hotel Confrontation and Kidnapping Revelation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details the army officers' intrusion into 'The Champ' and Henry's hotel room and the subsequent revelation of Rosita's kidnapping, setting up their involvement.

narrative_arcs.title: Hotel Room Standoff and Abrupt Departure

sub_scenes.title: El Tigre's Ransom and Forced Abduction
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene reveals El Tigre's ransom demands and the armed abduction of 'The Champ' and Henry, leading them to 'Mama'.

narrative_arcs.title: El Tigre's Ransom and Axis Connection
Arrival at the House and Introduction to 'Mama'

sub_scenes.title: Rescue Mission and El Tigre Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers the planning and execution of the rescue mission, culminating in the dramatic revelation of El Tigre's identity and initial confrontations.

narrative_arcs.title: Planning the Infiltration of El Tigre's Hideout

sub_scenes.title: Rosita's Rescue and Aftermath
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details the urgent news about Rosita's location, the rescue mission, and the successful liberation of Rosita, followed by immediate combat.

narrative_arcs.title: Execution of the Rear Entrance Plan
Machine Gun Threat and Champ's Intervention

Major_Arcs.title: Devil Dog Dolan and Submarine Plans
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces Devil Dog Dolan and his mission related to submarine detector plans, capture, and eventual escape.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Combat and Captain's Confession
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene begins with Dolan in jungle combat and transitions to a conversation where Captain Lawton confesses his compromised position and the need to surrender submarine plans.

narrative_arcs.title: Devil Dog Dolan in Action: Jungle Combat

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Infiltration, Ambush, and Capture
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Dolan's jungle infiltration, his being observed, and the native ambush leading to his capture.

sub_scenes.title: Capture, Torture, and Arson Escape
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers Dolan's capture, interrogation under torture for the plans, his coerced cooperation, and his subsequent arson as part of his escape strategy.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Fight and Native Alliance
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene describes Dolan's fight with natives, the accidental death of their chief, and the subsequent alliance formed with the tribe.

sub_scenes.title: Shipboard Brawl and Disciplinary Lesson
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details the events on the ship, including the captain's orders, the unexpected brawl initiated by Dolan, and the subsequent disciplinary action and lesson learned.

Major_Arcs.title: The Twinkle Twins and the Murder Mystery
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the Twinkle Twins and their investigation into a murder mystery, leading them through newspaper offices, police stations, and hospitals, and culminating in the capture of the culprit and a community celebration.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction to the Twinkle Twins and Murder Assignment
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the Twinkle Twins in an urban setting and details their assignment to investigate the murder of banker Robert Burgess.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of the Twinkle Twins and the Threat

sub_scenes.title: Police Station and Hospital Investigation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers the Twins' investigation at the police station, gaining information about the suspect, and their visit to the hospital to see Reilly's sick daughter.

narrative_arcs.title: Encounter with the Nurse and Revelation of Sick Girl

sub_scenes.title: Candy Store Call and Newspaper Clues
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details the Twins' growing suspicions about Barnacci, Dan's phone call to Elijah, and their discovery of crucial information in the newspaper leading them to the Irish section.

narrative_arcs.title: Reilly's Daughter and the Need for Farnacci's Blood
Phoning Elijah from the Candy Store
Arrival in Irish Section and Reilly Pursuit

sub_scenes.title: Irish Section Search and Revelation at Mrs. Murphy's
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers the Twins' search for Reilly in the Irish section, their unsuccessful attempts to get information, and their crucial encounter with Mrs. Murphy where they learn the truth about Farnacci and Reilly's daughter.

narrative_arcs.title: Unfruitful Search for Reilly in Irish Section
Encounter with Mrs. Murphy and Revelation of Reilly's Daughter's Plight

sub_scenes.title: Gunman Attack, Pursuit, and Community Justice
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details the sudden gunman attack at Mrs. Murphy's house, Dan and Diane's immediate pursuit, the community's intervention, and the capture of the criminals.

narrative_arcs.title: Dan Intervenes and Confronts Gunman on Car Roof
Police Arrival and Apprehension of Criminals
Awaiting News and Doctor's Diagnosis at the Hospital
Blood Donation Offer and Compatibility Issue
Urgent Call for Blood and Community Mobilization at Hospital
Blood Type Confirmation and Donor Preparation
The Life-Saving Transfusion and Immediate Revival
Post-Transfusion Observation and Anticipation of Recovery
Planning Farnacci's Capture and Police Pursuit
Forced Blood Donation and Birthday Celebration for Recovery
